description: Kiribandage Kapilawansha Upuwila, Vs The Hon. Attorney General, before Hon. Amal Ranaraja, J.
parties: Kiribandage Kapilawansha Upuwila, Vs The Hon. Attorney General,
keywords: Courts must evaluate evidence holistically, rather than a piecemeal analysis; considering both the prosecution’s and the accused’s testimonies together. This allows a fair assessment of each side’s strengths and weaknesses.
